definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Zhao said some of her favorite events at Lew-Port were two of the parties and the school dance she attended.
sentences.chinese: 韓說她在伯特中學最喜歡的活動就是派對和舞會。

sentences.english: Do you want to go to masquerade parties?
sentences.chinese: 你想去參加化裝舞會嗎？

sentences.english: What should girls NOT prepare for a debutante ball?
sentences.chinese: 女孩不應該爲初入社交舞會準備什麼？

sentences.english: And I mean this literally, because the Yule Ball is, first and foremost a dance.
sentences.chinese: 而我是認真的，因爲聖誕舞會是最重要的舞會。

sentences.english: And I mean this literally, because the Yule Ball is, first and foremost a dance.
sentences.chinese: 而我是認真的，因爲聖誕舞會是最重要的舞會。

sentences.english: At such an assembly as this, it would be insupportable.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的舞會上跳舞，簡直讓人受不了。

sentences.english: The party tonight was crowded with wits and beauties.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的舞會才子佳人雲集。

sentences.english: Short trousers are not proper at a dance.
sentences.chinese: 舞會上穿短褲不成體統。

sentences.english: One evening she met Captain Humphreys at a dance.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上她在舞會上遇到了軍官漢弗雷斯。

sentences.english: They silently split off the ball.
sentences.chinese: 他們悄悄地離開了舞會。

sentences.english: Their reception, including dinner and dancing, also was held there.
sentences.chinese: 他們的婚宴，包括宴會與舞會，也是在殯儀館舉行。

sentences.english: It is only a dance in honour of my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 這只是慶祝我生日的一次舞會。

sentences.english: And still. Harry hadn"t asked Cho to the ball."
sentences.chinese: 哈利仍舊沒有開口邀請秋去舞會。

sentences.english: In the evening we had a dance.
These masquerade balls became popular in continental Europe in the 17th century.
sentences.chinese: 這種化妝舞會在十七世紀的歐陸頗爲盛行。

definition: brimming with enthusiasm (idiom); full of warmth
to depart as quick as a flash/flash mob
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
